title: Is this brush script hand done?
content:
Is this a font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094121im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/aaa_6075.jpg)

 [‹ Techie font ID please!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094121/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43233 "Go to previous forum topic") [what font is this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094121/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43224 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredcastle

comments.content:
<cite>It looks likely.</cite>

There are two questions: One in the subject text and one in the body text. Which one are you answering?
It is a font - and it looks like [Bounce Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318094121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/bounce-script/) with added stroke.
